name: Jikko (AKking_YT)
description:
[Warning! This game contains blood and very sad scenes! You may want to keep a box of tissues at hand...]

Platform your way through a retro Gameboy style platformer and watch a story slowly come to life

Controls = arrow keys (I am trying to get it to where you can use a controller)

The game is currently unfinished, my dog died halfway through development and I have lost interest in making games for now. there was supposed to be over 20 levels but.. yeh... 

Bloopers/Game development: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFdgAqU5HPopdWsagJlS1zEBrBM_3URpU

Music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8RMD5SwRLYQ
